metadata.name: Global Tariff Briefing
metadata.audience: NYT colleagues tracking tariffs and trade policy globally

all.headline: Dollar Weakens as Uncertainty Over Tariff Persists: Markets Wrap
all.description: The dollar weakened in early Asia trading as uncertainty lingered after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping reciprocal tariffs and the leader said he instead plans to im

all.headline: US Tells Partners to Honor Tariff Deals as Trump Regroups
all.description: Senior US officials said President Donald Trump’s tariff defeat at the Supreme Court won’t unravel deals negotiated with US partners as they sought to defend the administration’s assertive trade polic

all.headline: Blue Owl Anxiety Rattles the $1.8 Trillion Private Credit Market
all.description: Despite years of solid returns, direct lenders can't shake concerns about the once-niche corner of global finance.

all.headline: Rolls-Royce Plans £1.5 Billion Stock Buyback, Sky News Says
all.description: Rolls-Royce Holdings PLC is set to announce a share buyback worth as much as £1.5 billion ($2 billion), Sky News reported.

all.headline: Bond Market Momentum Shifts Bears’ Way as Sell Signals Flash
all.description: From the Supreme Court’s decision against Donald Trump’s tariffs to the threat of Federal Reserve rate hikes and signs of labor-market resilience, a range of pressures are forcing a sentiment shift in

all.headline: Lagarde Says US Tariff Moves Risk Upsetting Equilibrium With EU
all.description: President Donald Trump’s latest tariff moves risk upsetting the previously negotiated “equilibrium” between the European Union and the US and could pose a new headwind to the economy, European Central

all.headline: Germany Is About to Find Out Whether Its Recovery Is Real
all.description: Data from Germany in the coming days will shed light on whether Europe’s largest economy is on the cusp of a meaningful revival or still being hampered by Donald Trump’s tariffs and its own chronic sh

all.headline: Option Pros Trade Index Versus Index to Play Huge Stock Rotation
all.description: Equity-options investors are looking to relative value trades between markets as opportunities to profit from dispersion strategies become scare.

all.headline: Hungary to Block EU Sanctions, Loans Over Druzhba Standoff
all.description: Hungary plans to block every European Union decision concerning Ukraine, including a new sanctions package against Russia and key loans, until oil starts flowing again through the Druzhba pipeline in

all.headline: Global Cash Is Fueling a Historic Start for Latin America Stocks
all.description: Global investors are piling into Latin American stocks at the fastest clip in a decade, sending markets across the region to multi-year highs.

all.headline: The uncertainties facing businesses and consumers after Trump's tariff changes
all.description: Businesses say questions remain after US President Donald Trump announced he will impose global tariffs of 15%.

all.headline: 'It is a catastrophe' - the man battling to stem rising youth unemployment
all.description: Alan Milburn returns to his hometown of Newcastle as he undertakes a review into the growing numbers of young people out of work.

all.headline: Trump says he will increase his new global tariffs to 15%
all.description: After most of his tariffs were outlawed on Friday, Trump announced new global tariffs of 10% - which he says he has now increased to 15%.

all.headline: Is £70 becoming harder to justify? The rise of cheaper blockbuster games
all.description: As top games such as GTA 6 are speculated to cost $100 (£74), some developers are deliberately pricing lower.

all.headline: Trump tariffs ripped up global trade order. What now?
all.description: If you think the Supreme Court ruling heralds a return to pre-Trump business as usual - think again.

all.headline: MPs to discuss inquiry into trade envoy role after Andrew arrest
all.description: A cross-party committee will also look into the appointment and accountability of UK trade envoys.

all.headline: KFC, Nando's, and others ditch chicken welfare pledge
all.description: Wingstop, Burger King, and others have walked away from an industry commitment to avoid using fast-growing chickens

all.headline: Higher tax helped UK government reach record January surplus
all.description: The government took in more from tax receipts than expected, official data suggests.

all.headline: Lobbying firm co-founded by Mandelson goes into administration
all.description: Global Counsel's clients cut ties with the firm over Lord Mandelson's links with sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

all.headline: UK agrees drone defence plan with four EU allies
all.description: The scheme will seek to take inspiration from Ukraine's drone manufacturing programme.

all.headline: Zelensky tells BBC Putin has started WW3 and must be stopped
all.description: Ukraine's president sat down with the BBC's Jeremy Bowen in Kyiv days before the four-year anniversary of the war.

all.headline: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
all.description: Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, known as "El Mencho", headed one of Mexico's most powerful drug cartels.

all.headline: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
all.description: The suspect was carrying a shotgun and fuel can when he was killed, officers said. Trump was in Washington DC at the time.

all.headline: Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan
all.description: Pakistan says the strikes were retaliation for recent suicide bombings in the country.

all.headline: Bones of St Francis of Assisi go on public display in Italy
all.description: The remains of Italy's patron saint have only been seen in public once before - for one day in 1978.

all.headline: Trump curious why Iran has not 'capitulated', US envoy Witkoff says
all.description: US envoy Steve Witkoff says the president is puzzled why Iran has not yet compromised in the face of a major American military build-up nearby.

all.headline: Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump US hospital boat
all.description: Greenland's PM reminded Trump of its free healthcare, after Trump said he was sending a boat to aid people who were allegedly "not being taken care of".

all.headline: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
all.description: Mike Huckabee suggested Israel would be justified in taking much of the Middle East on Biblical grounds.

all.headline: Explosions kill police officer and injure 25 in western Ukraine
all.description: Twenty-five people were injured by explosions overnight in what officials are calling a terror attack.

all.headline: More than 1,500 Venezuelan political prisoners apply for amnesty
all.description: The announcement by the head of Venezuela's National Assembly comes amid US pressure following the capture of ex-President Nicolás Maduro.

Macron announces pick for new budget minister
all.description: David Amiel, a 33-year-old close ally of the French president, pledges to roll out the 2026 budget agreed only last month.

all.headline: Democrats salivate over Trump tariff chaos
all.description: For Democrats, it’s not just the tariff ruling that could open a new messaging avenue — it’s also President Donald Trump’s doubling down.

all.headline: Macron asks Trump to lift sanctions on former EU tech chief Thierry Breton
all.description: Sanctions on EU citizens including Frenchman Thierry Breton were "unjustly imposed" by Washington, the French president argued.

all.headline: EU loses patience following Trump’s latest tariff threat
all.description: European Commission demands "full clarity" on Washington's plans, as a top EU trade lawmaker calls to delay a key vote on EU-U.S. trade deal.

all.headline: Trump’s unlikely hero: Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh
all.description: “I am so proud of him,” the president said Friday.

all.headline: Kyiv condemns ‘blackmail’ by Hungary, Slovakia as energy standoff escalates
all.description: Budapest and Bratislava have seized on the closure of a key oil pipeline to threaten to cut off electricity supplies to Ukraine.

all.headline: How the US is moving away from Chinese imports
all.description: Chinese goods now comprise less than 10 percent of U.S. imports.

all.headline: Wer gewinnt Rheinland-Pfalz? Alexander Schweitzer im Gespräch
all.description: In der rheinland-pfälzischen Landeshauptstadt Mainz bereitet sich Alexander Schweitzer auf seine erste Bewährungsprobe als gewählter Regierungschef vor. Es ist ein Spiel gegen die Zeit und gegen den B

all.headline: Trump says he’s sending hospital ship to Greenland; Denmark says no thank you
all.description: Danish prime minister extolled the health care system of Denmark and Greenland after Trump dispatched the vessel "to take care of the many people who are sick, and not being taken care of there."

all.headline: Meloni and Macron postpone their first high-level summit
all.description: Italy asked France to delay the Toulouse meeting until after the G7 summit in June.
